meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound used in the production of perfumes and sunscreens.
meanings.sent1: The benzophenone sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I added a pinch of benzophenone to the perfume mixture.
meanings.sent3: The benzophenone decided to take a vacation from the sunscreen factory.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a benzophenone crystal.
meanings.sent5: The scent of benzophenone lingered in the air, reminding me of summer days.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound with the formula C13H10O used as a UV filter in sunscreen products.
meanings.sent1: The dermatologist recommended a sunscreen with benzophenone for my sensitive skin.
meanings.sent2: Benzophenone helps protect the skin from harmful UV rays.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sun played hide-and-seek with the benzophenone in the lotion.
meanings.sent4: Her umbrella was a shield against the sun, just like benzophenone for the skin.
meanings.sent5: The beach was a sea of laughter and sunscreen, with benzophenone leading the way.
